function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-term exposure to pollution increasing vulnerability to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to COVID-19 and other pandemics","Mitigation":"Improving air quality and reducing pollution","Technologies":"Air purification systems, emission controls, green transportation","People":"Populations in areas with high pollution levels","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Secondary impacts of pollution reduction measures and meteorological conditions","Impact":"Unintended consequences and potential increase in Ozone concentration","Mitigation":"Comprehensive study of secondary impacts, consideration of meteorological conditions","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, predictive modeling, pollution control measures","People":"Researchers, environmental agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, government"},{"Description":"Influence of ambient environment on virus transmission dynamics","Impact":"Affects virus survival on surfaces and airborne diffusion","Mitigation":"Improving environmental conditions, implementing hygiene measures","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, surface disinfection technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, environmental agencies"}]}
